title: San Grau
provenance_text:
Raoul Ubac [1910-1985], Paris, France; Galerie Maeght, Paris, France [1]; Leon A. Arkus [1915-1999], Pittsburgh, PA, by Janaury 1956 until May 1971 [2]; his gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1971.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 301 (illustrated, plate 112) in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. It was lent by Galerie Maeght. 
[2]. Mr. Arkus purchased the painting from the International from (the dealer) Mr. Maeght. See copy of letter to the artist from Mr. Arkus, dated January 20, 1956, in curatorial file.
